reviewText:
These two detective stories, linked by father and son investigative work, offer the viewer some interest and, at times, some suspense.
Too many of the points they are trying to make, however, are not plausible in my view. They also leave the viewer with too many unanswered questions and concerns. The acting, in my opinion, is from very good to mediocre and this is also why I only gave it an OK.
